title: Landing Page Render and Hero Animation
description: Verify that the landing page loads correctly with the hero section displaying animated introduction and 3D Earth background functioning smoothly.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage URL
Check that the hero section is present
Verify that the 3D Earth animation is rendered and responsive
Confirm the animated introduction text appears and cycles through dynamic content smoothly

title: About Section Content Display
description: Validate that the About section displays biography, education, achievements, and community involvement details correctly.

steps.description: Scroll to the About section on the homepage
Check the biography text is displayed accurately
Verify education details are shown with correct formatting
Confirm achievements and community involvement info is present

title: Skills Section Interactive Display
description: Ensure that skills are displayed interactively with categories and proficiency levels and that client-side animations function correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to Skills section
Verify skills are grouped into correct categories
Check that each skill shows the associated proficiency level
Interact with skill elements (e.g., hover or click)
Confirm client-side animations trigger smoothly

title: Projects Section Display and Interaction
description: Validate that portfolio projects are displayed with images, tech stack tags, and working demo and repository links, including interactive project cards.

steps.description: Navigate to Projects section
Check each project card shows an image and tech stack tags
Verify demo link opens correct project demo in new tab
Confirm repository link points to the correct source repository
Hover or click on a project card
Ensure interactive effects or animations trigger properly

title: Experience Timeline Rendering and Details
description: Ensure the experience timeline displays job roles, companies, and durations correctly and renders client-side data properly.

steps.description: Navigate to Experience section
Confirm timeline shows all experience entries in chronological order
Check job roles, company names, and employment durations are displayed accurately
Scroll through timeline
Verify smooth client-side rendering and animations

title: Blog Section Markdown Rendering and Excerpts
description: Validate that blog posts are rendered correctly with markdown content, excerpts, and cover images.

steps.description: Navigate to Blog section
Verify list displays blog post titles with excerpts
Check each blog post displays appropriate cover image
Open individual blog post
Confirm markdown content renders with correct formatting (e.g., headings, lists, links)

title: Contact Form Validation Success and Error Handling
description: Verify contact form input validation enforces required fields and correct formats, and backend API accepts valid submissions and rejects invalid data with errors.

steps.description: Navigate to Contact section
Submit contact form with all valid inputs
Confirm submission success message is shown
Submit contact form with missing required fields
Verify validation error messages appear appropriately
Submit contact form with invalid email format
Check for specific validation error about email format
Submit contact form triggering backend API error (simulate if possible)
Verify user-friendly error message is displayed

title: Admin Authentication Login and Session Management
description: Test admin login with valid and invalid credentials, ensure session is maintained securely and logout invalidates session.

steps.description: Navigate to admin login page
Enter valid admin username and password
Click login
Verify login is successful and admin dashboard is accessible
Reload admin dashboard page
Confirm session persists and user remains logged in
Click logout button
Check user is logged out and redirected to login page
Attempt login with invalid credentials
Verify login failure message is shown and access denied

title: Admin Dashboard CRUD Operations for Portfolio Content
description: Validate that admin can create, read, update, and delete portfolio projects, skills, experience entries, and blog posts with UI reflecting changes accordingly.

steps.description: Log in as admin and navigate to dashboard
Create a new project with valid details
Confirm the new project appears in the projects list
Edit an existing skill entry and save changes
Verify the updated skill details are reflected correctly
Delete an experience entry
Check the deleted entry is removed from the experience list
Create a new blog post with markdown content
Confirm blog post appears in the blog list with correct excerpt and metadata

title: Admin Dashboard Message Management
description: Ensure admin dashboard allows viewing and managing incoming contact messages.

steps.description: Log in as admin and open message management panel
Verify incoming messages are listed with sender name, email, and message preview
Open a message detail
Confirm full message content is displayed
Mark message as read or delete message
Check message status updates accordingly or is removed from list

title: 3D Earth Component Light/Dark Mode Integration
description: Verify the interactive 3D Earth component switches correctly between light and dark themes and remains responsive.

steps.description: Navigate to homepage containing 3D Earth component
Confirm 3D Earth renders properly in default theme
Toggle dark/light theme via theme switcher
Ensure 3D Earth appearance changes correspondingly and smoothly
Check component remains interactive and responsive after theme change

title: SEO Metadata and Sitemap Availability
description: Validate that SEO metadata is present on all public pages, and sitemap.xml and robots.txt generate correctly and are accessible.

steps.description: Navigate to homepage and inspect page source
Verify SEO metadata tags (title, description, canonical) exist and are correct
Request /sitemap.xml
Confirm sitemap document is returned with correct URLs listed
Request /robots.txt
Check robots.txt file is returned and contains appropriate rules

title: Dark and Light Theme Switching Across Pages
description: Check that dark and light theme toggling works correctly across all pages and components with smooth animations.

steps.description: Visit multiple pages including homepage, about, projects, blog
Verify default theme is applied consistently
Toggle theme switcher to change theme
Confirm theme change affects all components and pages correctly
Check animations and transitions for theme switch are smooth and without glitches

title: Multi-language Content Rendering
description: Verify multi-language support works by switching locales and confirming localized content renders correctly in all sections.

steps.description: Set user locale to English
Check all sections display content in English
Change user locale to alternate language (e.g., another supported locale)
Verify all page content updates to the selected language
Confirm no untranslated text or placeholders are present

title: Navigation Bar Responsiveness and Smooth Scroll
description: Test that the responsive navigation bar adapts to different screen sizes and smooth scroll navigation works to page sections.

steps.description: Open the website on desktop screen size
Verify navbar displays all links and theme toggle correctly
Click on each navigation link
Confirm page scrolls smoothly to corresponding section
Resize browser to mobile viewport
Check navbar collapses into hamburger menu
Open hamburger menu and click navigation links
Verify smooth scrolling still functions correctly

title: API Endpoint Success and Error Responses
description: Validate REST API endpoints for skills, experience, projects, blog posts, and contact accept valid requests and respond with appropriate success and error statuses.

steps.description: Make valid GET, POST, PUT, DELETE requests to each CRUD API endpoint
Confirm APIs respond with 200 or appropriate success status codes
Make invalid requests with missing or malformed data
Verify APIs respond with proper error codes (e.g., 400, 401, 403, 404)
Attempt unauthorized calls where applicable
Check for appropriate denial responses

title: Database Data Integrity and Relationship Enforcement
description: Ensure the database schema enforces data integrity rules and relationships among projects, skills, experience, blog posts, and messages.

steps.description: Insert valid records into each table via API or admin dashboard
Verify data is stored correctly with foreign key constraints enforced
Attempt to insert invalid data violating relationship constraints
Confirm database rejects insertion or updates with constraint violation errors
Delete a record with dependent records linked
Verify cascading rules or error prevents orphan records
